answerText: Mimesis: The Representation of Reality in Western Literature[10] The last section of Mimesis discusses Proust's In Search of Lost Time and this author's novel To The Lighthouse.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Michigan A, MIT A | 12 | Literature | Other | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this comprehensive literary study by Erich Auerbach that examined the ways in which Western writers depicted the everyday lives of people.
